name: The Way Home (itch) (kenped)
description:
An old school text adventure with modern features such as Auto-mapping and a four-word parser. It is a sequel but can be played independent of the other episodes in The Bash Saga which are called "The Dragon Diamond"(1) and "Stone of Wisdom"(3).

STORY: You are Bash, henchman for Queen Drana. After finding the Dragon Diamond in The Forest of Fear, you must return to Queen Drana with the diamond. An old school text adventure with some modern features, such as a 4-word parser and auto-mapping.

NB: You will get the best experience if you play the game locally on your machine, i.e. either on Windows, Mac, Linux or Android. It is recommended to download an interpreter which can be used for other games as well.
